input_text.Prompt:
Using the item specifications and item name, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item name:
Storm

Item specifications:
A Bowen Designs Sculpture!
Detailed sculpture of Storm from the X-Men franchise in white constume
Statue measures 12" Tall
Sculpted by Mark Newman, Gabe Perna, and Randy Bowen
input_text.Response A:
The ultimate collectible for X-Men fans!

This stunning white statue of Storm measures 12" tall and features intricate and detailed craftsmanship that is synonymous with the world-class quality that you've come to expect from Bowen Designs. This limited edition, hand-crafted sculpture was created by acclaimed artists Mark Newman, Gabe Perna, and Randy Bowen, and is a must-have for any fan of the X-Men franchise. With its sleek design and intricate details, this sculpture is a must-have for any X-Men fan.
input_text.Response B: With her ability to control the weather, Ororo Munroe - code-named Storm - has been one of the X-Men's most powerful members since her debut in Giant-Size X-Men #1. This dynamic statue, sculpted by Mark Newman, Gabe Perna, and Randy Bowen, features Storm in her white costume that she wore during the 1990's. Standing 12" tall, the Storm: White Costume statue shows Ororo leaping from a rocky base with the winds at her back. Painted and ready to display.
